content.text: Hi! I'm a big fan of 80's music. Do you have a favorite band or song?
I like a lot of bands from the 80's, but I think my favorite is The Cure.
Awesome! They're one of my favorites too. I love their song "Lovesong."
That's a great song! I also like "Friday I'm in Love" and "The Walk."
Those are two of my favorites too! What do you like about The Cure?
I love their sound and lyrics. They're really unique and have a lot of emotion.
I agree! I also love their music videos. They're so creative and always make me feel something.
Me too! I think their music videos are some of the best ever.
I'm glad we have similar music tastes. It's always nice to meet someone who appreciates The Cure.
Me too! I'm excited to move to a new city where I can meet more people who like 80's music.
I'm sure you'll find some great people to hang out with. There are a lot of 80's music fans out there.
I hope so! I'm looking forward to it.
